name: Mian's Ramen Stall
description:
Ding Ding! It's time to open up the stall!

Join Mian in one of his average day of selling ramen in his small stall. Meet different characters and make different ramens for them. 

<< Dev note: This is my first ever game which I made in less than 2 weeks, it's far from perfect so apologies for any bugs beforehand! >> 
- If you are playing from the browser, there won't be any music to avoid the game glitching to the moon and back.
- If you're installing on your phone, you can click anywhere on the screen to go to the next dialogue and the ">>" button to skip to just the ramen making
